data.title: Sakha, RU Climate Zone, Monthly Weather Averages and Historical Data
data.meta_description: Climate of Sakha, Russia. Information regarding Sakha climate zones and historical climate data including temperature and precipitation.
data.text:
Sakha, Russia Climate

Weather: 8.08°C/46.54°F, Wind SW at 5.59 km/h, 82% Humidity, 0% Chance of rain

Sakha Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 102.62 meters (336.68 feet) above sea level, Sakha has a Subartic, severe very cold winter, no dry season, cool summer climate (Classification: Dfd). The city’s yearly temperature is -8.95ºC (15.89ºF) and it is -14.22% lower than Russia’s averages. Sakha typically receives about 39.94 millimeters (1.57 inches) of precipitation and has 95.1 rainy days (26.05% of the time) annually.
